channel.title: INfinance
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from INfinance, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Did Salesforce finally prove the bears wrong? The stock is rising off an upbeat AI forecast.
item.description: Salesforce guided for $60 billion in revenue by fiscal 2030, igniting optimism about the company’s AI-monetization strategy.

item.title: Most Americans are falling behind in saving for retirement. Here’s how they can make up the difference.
item.description: The savings shortfall comes as Social Security faces insolvency, people are living longer and inflation outpaces earnings gains.

item.title: U.S. economy has lost momentum over the past 2 months, Fed’s ‘beige book’ finds
item.description: Consumer spending inched down in recent weeks, the Federal Reserve’s latest survey found.

item.title: This expense is eroding Americans’ retirement security — and financial planners often fail to help them
item.description: This habit can be a massive financial drain that people don’t want to give up

item.title: Micron may follow Nvidia and AMD with this move that could send its stock higher, Citi says
item.description: The memory-chip maker’s DRAM chips are expected to be the next target for long-term AI-infrastructure contracts, Citi says, and higher prices should h...

item.title: Stocks Sink in Broad AI Rout Sparked by China's DeepSeek
item.description: U.S. stocks were mostly lower, with the Nasdaq leading declines as makers of AI infrastructure suffered steep falls, many in the double digits. Nvidia...

item.title: Financial Services Roundup: Market Talk
item.description: Gain insight on Experian, SoFi Technologies and more in the latest Market Talks covering Financial Services.

item.title: DeepSeek Won't Sink U.S. AI Titans
item.description: Panic fueling the selloff of Nvidia, Broadcom and other tech giants is overblown.

item.title: Comex Gold, Silver Settle Lower
item.description: Gold settled 1.4% lower, down two of the past three sessions, and silver fell 2.5%, down three of the past four sessions.

item.title: Arabica Coffee Prices Hit Record on U.S., Colombia Tariff Spat
